basic.description:
Explores cultural meanings of health and illness, the power dynamics through which these meanings are constructed, and related injustices in bodily experiences.
NOTE    Limited spots are available for students in a DEVS or NURS Plan.
LEARNING HOURS    120  (24L;12T;84P)
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: The Politics of Health and Illness

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    (HLTH 101/3.0 or KNPE 167/3.0 or PHED 167/3.0 or SOCY 122/6.0) and level 3 in a PHED, KINE or HLTH plan
